name: the-cats-out-of-the-bag-bonnaroo-09-lineup-leaked
title: The Cat’s Out Of The Bag: Bonnaroo ’09 Lineup Leaked
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
We thought we’d have to wait until tomorrow morning, and then we heard it might come out at 11pm tonight, but it looks like the cat’s out of the bag with no one to blame but TV On The Radio and their Myspace blog. Without further ado, the lineup for Bonnaroo 2009:

Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band
Phish (2 Shows)
Beastie Boys
Nine Inch Nails
David Byrne
Wilco
Al Green
Snoop Dogg
Elvis Costello (Solo)
Erykah Badu
Paul Oakenfold
Ben Harper and Relentless7
The Mars Volta
TV on the Radio
Yeah Yeah Yeahs
Gov’t Mule
Andrew Bird
Merle Haggard
MGMT
moe.

Girl Talk
